CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Among PSCs fabricated , the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based device with an active blend layer spin - coated at 80 °C , showed the best photovoltaic performance with the highest PCE of 9.93% , a large V oc of 0.92 V , a highest J sc of 16.77 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 64.36% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I can help you identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. Here are the entities I found:

1. PSCs (Polycrystalline Silicon Cells)
2. PffBB-14 (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) - Poly(4-styrenesulfonate))
3. PC71BM (Poly(71-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester))
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
5. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)
6. J sc (Short Circuit Current)
7. FF (Fill Factor)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PffBB-14
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-14 |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Among PSCs fabricated , the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based device with an active blend layer spin - coated at 80 °C , showed the best photovoltaic performance with the highest PCE of 9.93% , a large V oc of 0.92 V , a highest J sc of 16.77 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 64.36% .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - 9.93%
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) - 0.92 V
3. J sc (Short Circuit Current Density) - 16.77 mA cm^-2
4. FF (Fill Factor) - 64.36%

These are the properties of the device being described in the paragraph, which are measured or calculated values of the device's performance.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - 9.93%
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) - 0.92 V
3. FF (Fill Factor) - 64.36%

These are the values of the material properties of the device being described in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
